message.original: 海岸は植生、魔物の種類とも平原とは異なる 特に多いのはハーピー、 そしてリザードマンなど水棲型
message.translation: "Besides the enviroment, the creatures who lurk here are much different then the plains. Harpies are plentiful. And Lizardman stalk close to water."

message.original: ブリア海岸南部は北部とは異なり 危険度が高い 水竜の目撃例も、多々
message.translation: "Unlike the northern part of Breya, rumor has it that a Water Dragon was spotted there."

message.original: 漂流船の発見時は、速やかに検分を
message.translation: "When a drifted ship is found, it is best to inspect it."

message.original: 波音は、精神衛生にも効果的――
message.translation: "The sound of the tides, is calming to the mind."

message.original: 海岸部の情報収集であれば、 ローテスへの立ち寄りを勧める
message.translation: "As far as coastal information gathering is concerned, I encourage you to stop by Rothes."
